summary: This mod adds into the game, a totally new weapon, called The Dark Blade, which you can craft, you can craft either a enchanted version, or a non-enchanted version.
descriptionHtml:
[color=black][size=10][u][i][b]The Dark Blade[/u][/i][/b][/size][/color]

[color=lightred][size=4]Small Description[/size]
[size=2]This mod adds into the game, a totally new weapon, called The Dark Blade, which you can craft, you can craft either a enchanted version, or a non-enchanted version.[/size]

[size=4]How To Craft The Non-Enchanted Version[/size]
[size=2]You will need the following items; 1 Daedra Heart, 1 Moonstone Ingot, 1 Empty Black Soul Gem, 2 Malachite Ingots, 2 Leather Strips, 3 Ebony Ingots. And you also need either the perks, Glass and Daedric Smithing, or you can have the spell Dark Blooded which you can get from an actor at the new MapMarker known as Dragon Altar, south of Dawnstar.[/size]

[size=4]How To Craft The Enchanted Version[/size]
[size=2]You will need the following items; 1 Daedra Heart, 1 Moonstone Ingot, 1 Full Black Soul Gem, 1 Troll Fat, 2 Malachite Ingots, 2 Leather Strips, 3 Ebony Ingots. And you also need either the perks, Glass, Daedric and Arcane Smithing, or you can have the spell Dark Blooded which you can get from an actor at the new MapMarker known as Dragon Altar, south of Dawnstar.[/size]

[size=4]The Dark Blade Stats[/size]
[size=2]Damage = 70
Weight = 3.6
Value = 575[/size]

[size=4]The Dark Blades Enchantment[/size]
[size=2]Fire Damage by 50 points
Soul Trap for 5 minutes
Absorb 50 Health
Absorb 50 Magicka
Absorb 50 Stamina[/size][/color]
author: Enoomnai
